reviews.title: Needs more tracks
reviews.comment: Only has 3 tracks. Needs lead sounds or loops, sax or string beatbox, and sample box for some back background. The sequencer is Awesome! Rocks
reviews.author: Garika Chidarikire

reviews.title: Too fun!
reviews.comment: I kill my battery with this app spending so much time making my samples and sequencing them... only problem with this app is it needs more and I\'d pay for it! Pattern sequencer, for looping multiple patterns would be nice. Live wav record to capture the pitch bends. Maybe double the channels to 6 and I could be driving people crazy! If you really wanna get serious some oscillators would be freaking awesome! Love the app! But I want more!!! XD ...oh and hit me back if you need more ideas for improvements...

reviews.comment: Cool stuff :) Funny when beatboxing with the sounds of your cat :)))

reviews.title: Dr Piranah is an idiot
reviews.comment: If u want the developer to decline political ads, email the developer directly. Only unabashed hatred, a symptom of racism, prompts you misuse a comment box, another symptom is brandishing unsupported claims, which Dr. Pirahna (the name fits) did throughout his/her ignorant, disrespectful, rant. If you are not stupid enough to think your comments does not REEK of a racist person TRYING not to sound racist, then your judgment is THAT clouded by your own racism to believe you actually pulled it off.
